text: Muhammadiyah (, followers of Muhammad); also known as the Muhammadiyah Society () is a major Islamic non-governmental organization in Indonesia.A. Jalil Hamid, Tackle the rising cost of living longer . New Straits Times, 30 October 2016. Accessed 1 November 2016. The organization was founded in 1912 by Ahmad Dahlan in the city of Yogyakarta. They support ijtihad - individual interpretation of Qur'an and Sunnah. It played an important role in the popularity of Salafism in Indonesia. ==References== Category:1912 establishments in Asia Category:Organizations based in Indonesia Category:Non- governmental organizations Category:Islamic organizations
title: Muhammadiyah
